data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Jose Luis Munuera Montero awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 1, Ball safe as Huesca is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Celta Vigo.
Throw-in for Celta Vigo in their own half.
In the minute 7, Huesca have been awarded a corner by Jose Luis Munuera Montero.
Huesca awarded a free kick in their own half.
Celta Vigo's Iago Aspas breaks free at Municipal de Balaidos. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 10, Ball goes out of play for a Huesca goal kick.
Can Huesca get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Celta Vigo's half?
Huesca's Javier Ontiveros gets in a shot on goal at Municipal de Balaidos. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 14, Jose Luis Munuera Montero signals a Huesca throw-in in Celta Vigo's half.
Free kick for Huesca in their own half.
Jose Luis Munuera Montero signals a free kick to Huesca in their own half.
In the minute 16, Huesca are coming forward and Javier Ontiveros gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Celta Vigo have a goal kick.
Free kick for Huesca in their own half.
In the minute 18, In Vigo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Huesca in the half of Celta Vigo.
David Ferreiro for Huesca drives towards goal at Municipal de Balaidos. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 21, In Vigo, Nolito (Celta Vigo) misses the target with a header.
Jose Luis Munuera Montero awards Huesca a goal kick.
Celta Vigo to take a throw-in in Huesca territory.
In the minute 25, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Vigo Celta Vigo drive forward through Nolito. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Jose Luis Munuera Montero signals a free kick to Celta Vigo just outside Huesca's area.
In the minute 27, Celta Vigo attack but Santi Mina's header doesn't find the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Vigo.
Jose Luis Munuera Montero signals a free kick to Huesca in their own half.
In the minute 31, Throw-in for Huesca at Municipal de Balaidos.
Huesca awarded a free kick in their own half.
Celta Vigo take a 1-0 lead thanks to Nolito.
In the minute 33, Iago Aspas with an assist there.
Free kick for Huesca in their own half.
Huesca awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 37, Huesca awarded a free kick in their own half.
Denis Suarez (Celta Vigo) gets a yellow card.
Throw-in for Huesca in the half of Celta Vigo.
In the minute 39, Can Huesca capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Celta Vigo's half?
Throw-in for Celta Vigo at Municipal de Balaidos.
Jose Luis Munuera Montero signals a free kick to Celta Vigo in their own half.
In the minute 40, Jose Luis Munuera Montero awards the home team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Huesca.
Goal kick for Celta Vigo at Municipal de Balaidos.
In the minute 44, Free kick Celta Vigo.
Huesca awarded a free kick in their own half.
The first-half has come to a close in Vigo.
In the minute 46, The second-half is now underway.
Ball safe as Celta Vigo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Jose Luis Munuera Montero signals a Huesca throw-in in Celta Vigo's half.
In the minute 47, Huesca needs to be cautious. Celta Vigo have an attacking throw-in.
Jose Luis Munuera Montero signals a free kick to Huesca in their own half.
Celta Vigo to take a throw-in in Huesca territory.
In the minute 51, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Huesca.
Free kick for Huesca in their own half.
In the minute 52, Free kick for Huesca in the half of Celta Vigo.
Celta Vigo's Nolito misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Huesca at Municipal de Balaidos.
In the minute 55, Celta Vigo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Jose Luis Munuera Montero signals a free kick to Celta Vigo in their own half.
Throw-in for Celta Vigo in their own half.
Ball safe as Huesca is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 56, The away team replace Borja Garcia with Rafa Mir.
Huesca awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 58, Jose Luis Munuera Montero awards the home team a throw-in.
Huesca are in shooting range from this free kick.
Huesca surge into the attack at Municipal de Balaidos but Jorge Pulidoâ€™s header is off-target.
In the minute 60, Jose Luis Munuera Montero awards Celta Vigo a goal kick.
Goal! Celta Vigo extend their lead to 2-0 through Iago Aspas.
Throw-in Celta Vigo.
In the minute 63, Can Huesca get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Celta Vigo's half?
Huesca to take a throw-in in Celta Vigo territory.
Huesca have a goal kick.
In the minute 67, Jose Luis Munuera Montero signals a Celta Vigo throw-in in Huesca's half.
Throw-in for Celta Vigo in the half of Huesca.
Sergio Gomez is replacing Javier Ontiveros for the away team.
In the minute 68, Huesca make their third substitution with Jaime Seoane replacing Mikel Rico.
Jose Luis Munuera Montero signals a throw-in for Huesca, close to Celta Vigo's area.
Jaime Seoane (Huesca) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 71, Jaime Seoane of Huesca gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Vigo.
Nolito is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 72, Free kick for Celta Vigo in their own half.
Fran Beltran is on a sub for Iago Aspas for Celta Vigo.
Okay Yokuslu is replacing Denis Suarez for Celta Vigo at Municipal de Balaidos.
In the minute 74, Jose Luis Munuera Montero signals a free kick to Celta Vigo in their own half.
In Vigo Huesca drive forward through Jaime Seoane. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Huesca have been awarded a corner by Jose Luis Munuera Montero.
In the minute 77, Celta Vigo's Hugo Mallo gets in a shot on goal at Municipal de Balaidos. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Huesca make their fourth substitution with Juan Carlos replacing Pedro Lopez.
Nolito for Celta Vigo drives towards goal at Municipal de Balaidos. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 83, The home team replace Nolito with Miguel Baeza.
Eduardo Coudet (Celta Vigo) is making a fourth substitution, with Jose Fontan replacing Renato Tapia.
Jaime Seoane strikes to reduce the deficit to 2-1 at Municipal de Balaidos.
In the minute 85, Huesca awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Huesca get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Celta Vigo's half?
In the minute 87, Can Huesca capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Huesca drives forward and Sergio Gomez gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
At Municipal de Balaidos the fourth official shows that 6 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Corner awarded to Huesca.
Celta Vigo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Huesca goal kick.
Jose Luis Munuera Montero signals a free kick to Huesca.
Huesca have been awarded a corner by Jose Luis Munuera Montero.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-1.
Eduardo Coudet is making the team's fifth substitution at Municipal de Balaidos with Joseph Aidoo replacing Lucas Olaza.
Hugo Mallo is booked for the home team.
